title: The Secondary Teacher
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and E.J. Perry
brief_description: Describes the life of secondary student teachers in training: accommodation in a boarding house in Armadale, Victoria, for those from the country areas; Melbourne University and the various courses available for students. Also gives details about specialised couses and shows classes in progress. Shows the science, commerce, music and engineering faculties. Narrated by Terry Dear and animation by the Owen Brothers.
